title: Rajasthan Heritage Tour
description: Experience the rich heritage and culture of Rajasthan with visits to Jaipur, Udaipur, and Jaisalmer.

title: Goa Beach Vacation
description: Relax on the beautiful beaches of Goa with a package that includes accommodation, beach activities, and nightlife exploration.

title: Kerala Backwaters Experience
description: Enjoy a tranquil journey through the backwaters of Kerala with a houseboat stay and visits to hill stations and beaches.

title: Agra and Delhi Highlights
description: A tour package covering the highlights of Agra and Delhi, including the Taj Mahal, Red Fort, and other historic landmarks.

title: Mumbai City Explorer
description: Explore Mumbai with a package that includes city tours, visits to Bollywood studios, and a taste of Mumbai's street food.

title: Bangalore Tech Tour
description: A package focused on exploring the IT hubs of Bangalore along with visits to local attractions and cultural sites.

title: Chennai Cultural Experience
description: Experience the rich culture and traditions of Chennai with guided tours to historic temples, museums, and local markets.

title: Darjeeling Hill Station Package
description: Discover the beauty of Darjeeling with a package that includes a visit to the tea gardens, Himalayan views, and local attractions.

title: Shimla Hill Retreat
description: Enjoy the serene beauty of Shimla with a package that includes scenic hill station tours and cozy accommodations.

title: Chandigarh Modern City Tour
description: Explore the modern architecture and urban planning of Chandigarh with a package that includes city tours and local experiences.
